keyFacts: The invoice is dated October 26, 2004, and details shipping charges totaling $334.75.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is the account holder for the FedEx services detailed in the invoice.
Multiple shipments were made by Epstein, with various recipients listed.
The invoice includes a due date for payment of November 10, 2004.
Several individuals are mentioned as recipients of packages sent by Epstein.
